beer.name: Smoke Ale
beer.description: A German style Rauchbier with an orange-amber hue, a delicate smoke aroma and flavor, with an intense hop finish.
beer.grains: Great Western Harringon, Klages, Munich & Hugh Baird Crystal, Carastan 30-37 & 13-17, Chuck's Alderwood Smoked Munich and Smoked Bamberg Beechwood.
Great Western Harringon, Klages, Munich & Hugh Baird Crystal, Carastan 30-37 & 13-17, Chuck's Alderwood Smoked Munich and Smoked Bamberg Beechwood.
